51
52/* Interface history:
53 *
54 * 1.1 - ??
55 * 1.2 - Add vertex2 ioctl (keith)
56 * - Add stencil capability to clear ioctl (gareth, keith)
57 * - Increase MAX_TEXTURE_LEVELS (brian)
58 * 1.3 - Add cmdbuf ioctl (keith)
59 * - Add support for new radeon packets (keith)
60 * - Add getparam ioctl (keith)
61 * - Add flip-buffers ioctl, deprecate fullscreen foo (keith).
62 * 1.4 - Add scratch registers to get_param ioctl.
63 * 1.5 - Add r200 packets to cmdbuf ioctl
64 * - Add r200 function to init ioctl
65 * - Add 'scalar2' instruction to cmdbuf
66 * 1.6 - Add static GART memory manager
67 * Add irq handler (won't be turned on unless X server knows to)
68 * Add irq ioctls and irq_active getparam.
69 * Add wait command for cmdbuf ioctl
70 * Add GART offset query for getparam
71 * 1.7 - Add support for cube map registers: R200_PP_CUBIC_FACES_[0..5]
72 * and R200_PP_CUBIC_OFFSET_F1_[0..5].
73 * Added packets R200_EMIT_PP_CUBIC_FACES_[0..5] and
74 * R200_EMIT_PP_CUBIC_OFFSETS_[0..5]. (brian)
75 * 1.8 - Remove need to call cleanup ioctls on last client exit (keith)
76 * Add 'GET' queries for starting additional clients on different VT's.
77 * 1.9 - Add DRM_IOCTL_RADEON_CP_RESUME ioctl.
78 * Add texture rectangle support for r100.
79 * 1.10- Add SETPARAM ioctl; first parameter to set is FB_LOCATION, which
80 * clients use to tell the DRM where they think the framebuffer is
81 * located in the card's address space
82 * 1.11- Add packet R200_EMIT_RB3D_BLENDCOLOR to support GL_EXT_blend_color
83 * and GL_EXT_blend_[func|equation]_separate on r200
84 * 1.12- Add R300 CP microcode support - this just loads the CP on r300
85 * (No 3D support yet - just microcode loading).
86 * 1.13- Add packet R200_EMIT_TCL_POINT_SPRITE_CNTL for ARB_point_parameters
87 * - Add hyperz support, add hyperz flags to clear ioctl.
88 * 1.14- Add support for color tiling
89 * - Add R100/R200 surface allocation/free support
90 * 1.15- Add support for texture micro tiling
91 * - Add support for r100 cube maps
92 * 1.16- Add R200_EMIT_PP_TRI_PERF_CNTL packet to support brilinear
93 * texture filtering on r200
94 * 1.17- Add initial support for R300 (3D).
95 * 1.18- Add support for GL_ATI_fragment_shader, new packets
96 * R200_EMIT_PP_AFS_0/1, R200_EMIT_PP_TXCTLALL_0-5 (replaces
97 * R200_EMIT_PP_TXFILTER_0-5, 2 more regs) and R200_EMIT_ATF_TFACTOR
98 * (replaces R200_EMIT_TFACTOR_0 (8 consts instead of 6)
99 * 1.19- Add support for gart table in FB memory and PCIE r300
100 * 1.20- Add support for r300 texrect
101 * 1.21- Add support for card type getparam
102 * 1.22- Add support for texture cache flushes (R300_TX_CNTL)
103 * 1.23- Add new radeon memory map work from benh
104 * 1.24- Add general-purpose packet for manipulating scratch registers (r300)
105 * 1.25- Add support for r200 vertex programs (R200_EMIT_VAP_PVS_CNTL,
106 * new packet type)
107 * 1.26- Add support for variable size PCI(E) gart aperture
108 * 1.27- Add support for IGP GART
109 * 1.28- Add support for VBL on CRTC2
110 * 1.29- R500 3D cmd buffer support
111 * 1.30- Add support for occlusion queries
112 * 1.31- Add support for num Z pipes from GET_PARAM
113 * 1.32- fixes for rv740 setup
114 * 1.33- Add r6xx/r7xx const buffer support
115 * 1.34- fix evergreen/cayman GS register
116 */
117#define DRIVER_MAJOR 1
118#define DRIVER_MINOR 34
119#define DRIVER_PATCHLEVEL 0
120

349/* Check whether the given hardware address is inside the framebuffer or the
350 * GART area.
351 */
352static __inline__ int radeon_check_offset(drm_radeon_private_t *dev_priv,
353 u64 off)
354{
355 u32 fb_start = dev_priv->fb_location;
356 u32 fb_end = fb_start + dev_priv->fb_size - 1;
357 u32 gart_start = dev_priv->gart_vm_start;
358 u32 gart_end = gart_start + dev_priv->gart_size - 1;
359
360 return ((off >= fb_start && off <= fb_end) ||
361 (off >= gart_start && off <= gart_end));
362}

474/* Flags for stats.boxes
475 */
476#define RADEON_BOX_DMA_IDLE 0x1
477#define RADEON_BOX_RING_FULL 0x2
478#define RADEON_BOX_FLIP 0x4
479#define RADEON_BOX_WAIT_IDLE 0x8
480#define RADEON_BOX_TEXTURE_LOAD 0x10
481
482/* Register definitions, register access macros and drmAddMap constants
483 * for Radeon kernel driver.
484 */
485#define RADEON_MM_INDEX 0x0000
486#define RADEON_MM_DATA 0x0004
487
488#define RADEON_AGP_COMMAND 0x0f60
489#define RADEON_AGP_COMMAND_PCI_CONFIG 0x0060 /* offset in PCI config */
490# define RADEON_AGP_ENABLE (1<<8)
491#define RADEON_AUX_SCISSOR_CNTL 0x26f0
492# define RADEON_EXCLUSIVE_SCISSOR_0 (1 << 24)
493# define RADEON_EXCLUSIVE_SCISSOR_1 (1 << 25)
494# define RADEON_EXCLUSIVE_SCISSOR_2 (1 << 26)
495# define RADEON_SCISSOR_0_ENABLE (1 << 28)
496# define RADEON_SCISSOR_1_ENABLE (1 << 29)
497# define RADEON_SCISSOR_2_ENABLE (1 << 30)
498
499/*
500 * PCIE radeons (rv370/rv380, rv410, r423/r430/r480, r5xx)
501 * don't have an explicit bus mastering disable bit. It's handled
502 * by the PCI D-states. PMI_BM_DIS disables D-state bus master
503 * handling, not bus mastering itself.
504 */
505#define RADEON_BUS_CNTL 0x0030
506/* r1xx, r2xx, r300, r(v)350, r420/r481, rs400/rs480 */
507# define RADEON_BUS_MASTER_DIS (1 << 6)
508/* rs600/rs690/rs740 */
509# define RS600_BUS_MASTER_DIS (1 << 14)
510# define RS600_MSI_REARM (1 << 20)
511/* see RS400_MSI_REARM in AIC_CNTL for rs480 */
512
513#define RADEON_BUS_CNTL1 0x0034
514# define RADEON_PMI_BM_DIS (1 << 2)
515# define RADEON_PMI_INT_DIS (1 << 3)
516
517#define RV370_BUS_CNTL 0x004c
518# define RV370_PMI_BM_DIS (1 << 5)
519# define RV370_PMI_INT_DIS (1 << 6)
520
521#define RADEON_MSI_REARM_EN 0x0160
522/* rv370/rv380, rv410, r423/r430/r480, r5xx */
523# define RV370_MSI_REARM_EN (1 << 0)
524
525#define RADEON_CLOCK_CNTL_DATA 0x000c
526# define RADEON_PLL_WR_EN (1 << 7)
527#define RADEON_CLOCK_CNTL_INDEX 0x0008
528#define RADEON_CONFIG_APER_SIZE 0x0108
529#define RADEON_CONFIG_MEMSIZE 0x00f8
530#define RADEON_CRTC_OFFSET 0x0224
531#define RADEON_CRTC_OFFSET_CNTL 0x0228
532# define RADEON_CRTC_TILE_EN (1 << 15)
533# define RADEON_CRTC_OFFSET_FLIP_CNTL (1 << 16)
534#define RADEON_CRTC2_OFFSET 0x0324
535#define RADEON_CRTC2_OFFSET_CNTL 0x0328
536
537#define RADEON_PCIE_INDEX 0x0030
538#define RADEON_PCIE_DATA 0x0034
539#define RADEON_PCIE_TX_GART_CNTL 0x10
540# define RADEON_PCIE_TX_GART_EN (1 << 0)
541# define RADEON_PCIE_TX_GART_UNMAPPED_ACCESS_PASS_THRU (0 << 1)
542# define RADEON_PCIE_TX_GART_UNMAPPED_ACCESS_CLAMP_LO (1 << 1)
543# define RADEON_PCIE_TX_GART_UNMAPPED_ACCESS_DISCARD (3 << 1)
544# define RADEON_PCIE_TX_GART_MODE_32_128_CACHE (0 << 3)
545# define RADEON_PCIE_TX_GART_MODE_8_4_128_CACHE (1 << 3)
546# define RADEON_PCIE_TX_GART_CHK_RW_VALID_EN (1 << 5)
547# define RADEON_PCIE_TX_GART_INVALIDATE_TLB (1 << 8)
548#define RADEON_PCIE_TX_DISCARD_RD_ADDR_LO 0x11
549#define RADEON_PCIE_TX_DISCARD_RD_ADDR_HI 0x12
550#define RADEON_PCIE_TX_GART_BASE 0x13
551#define RADEON_PCIE_TX_GART_START_LO 0x14
552#define RADEON_PCIE_TX_GART_START_HI 0x15

871#define RADEON_RBBM_SOFT_RESET 0x00f0
872# define RADEON_SOFT_RESET_CP (1 << 0)
873# define RADEON_SOFT_RESET_HI (1 << 1)
874# define RADEON_SOFT_RESET_SE (1 << 2)
875# define RADEON_SOFT_RESET_RE (1 << 3)
876# define RADEON_SOFT_RESET_PP (1 << 4)
877# define RADEON_SOFT_RESET_E2 (1 << 5)
878# define RADEON_SOFT_RESET_RB (1 << 6)
879# define RADEON_SOFT_RESET_HDP (1 << 7)
880/*
881 * 6:0 Available slots in the FIFO
882 * 8 Host Interface active
883 * 9 CP request active
884 * 10 FIFO request active
885 * 11 Host Interface retry active
886 * 12 CP retry active
887 * 13 FIFO retry active
888 * 14 FIFO pipeline busy
889 * 15 Event engine busy
890 * 16 CP command stream busy
891 * 17 2D engine busy
892 * 18 2D portion of render backend busy
893 * 20 3D setup engine busy
894 * 26 GA engine busy
895 * 27 CBA 2D engine busy
896 * 31 2D engine busy or 3D engine busy or FIFO not empty or CP busy or
897 * command stream queue not empty or Ring Buffer not empty
898 */
899#define RADEON_RBBM_STATUS 0x0e40
900/* Same as the previous RADEON_RBBM_STATUS; this is a mirror of that register. */
901/* #define RADEON_RBBM_STATUS 0x1740 */
902/* bits 6:0 are dword slots available in the cmd fifo */
903# define RADEON_RBBM_FIFOCNT_MASK 0x007f
904# define RADEON_HIRQ_ON_RBB (1 << 8)
905# define RADEON_CPRQ_ON_RBB (1 << 9)
906# define RADEON_CFRQ_ON_RBB (1 << 10)
907# define RADEON_HIRQ_IN_RTBUF (1 << 11)
908# define RADEON_CPRQ_IN_RTBUF (1 << 12)
909# define RADEON_CFRQ_IN_RTBUF (1 << 13)
910# define RADEON_PIPE_BUSY (1 << 14)
911# define RADEON_ENG_EV_BUSY (1 << 15)
912# define RADEON_CP_CMDSTRM_BUSY (1 << 16)
913# define RADEON_E2_BUSY (1 << 17)
914# define RADEON_RB2D_BUSY (1 << 18)
915# define RADEON_RB3D_BUSY (1 << 19) /* not used on r300 */
916# define RADEON_VAP_BUSY (1 << 20)
917# define RADEON_RE_BUSY (1 << 21) /* not used on r300 */
918# define RADEON_TAM_BUSY (1 << 22) /* not used on r300 */
919# define RADEON_TDM_BUSY (1 << 23) /* not used on r300 */
920# define RADEON_PB_BUSY (1 << 24) /* not used on r300 */
921# define RADEON_TIM_BUSY (1 << 25) /* not used on r300 */
922# define RADEON_GA_BUSY (1 << 26)
923# define RADEON_CBA2D_BUSY (1 << 27)
924# define RADEON_RBBM_ACTIVE (1 << 31)

1850#define RADEON_READ(reg) DRM_READ32( dev_priv->mmio, (reg) )
1851#define RADEON_WRITE(reg, val) \
1852do { \
1853 if (reg < 0x10000) { \
1854 DRM_WRITE32(dev_priv->mmio, (reg), (val)); \
1855 } else { \
1856 DRM_WRITE32(dev_priv->mmio, RADEON_MM_INDEX, (reg)); \
1857 DRM_WRITE32(dev_priv->mmio, RADEON_MM_DATA, (val)); \
1858 } \
1859} while (0)
1860#define RADEON_READ8(reg) DRM_READ8( dev_priv->mmio, (reg) )
1861#define RADEON_WRITE8(reg,val) DRM_WRITE8( dev_priv->mmio, (reg), (val) )
1862
1863#define RADEON_WRITE_PLL(addr, val) \
1864do { \
1865 RADEON_WRITE8(RADEON_CLOCK_CNTL_INDEX, \
1866 ((addr) & 0x1f) | RADEON_PLL_WR_EN ); \
1867 RADEON_WRITE(RADEON_CLOCK_CNTL_DATA, (val)); \
1868} while (0)
1869
1870#define RADEON_WRITE_PCIE(addr, val) \
1871do { \
1872 RADEON_WRITE8(RADEON_PCIE_INDEX, \
1873 ((addr) & 0xff)); \
1874 RADEON_WRITE(RADEON_PCIE_DATA, (val)); \
1875} while (0)
1876
1877#define R500_WRITE_MCIND(addr, val) \
1878do { \
1879 RADEON_WRITE(R520_MC_IND_INDEX, 0xff0000 | ((addr) & 0xff)); \
1880 RADEON_WRITE(R520_MC_IND_DATA, (val)); \
1881 RADEON_WRITE(R520_MC_IND_INDEX, 0); \
1882} while (0)
1883
1884#define RS480_WRITE_MCIND(addr, val) \
1885do { \
1886 RADEON_WRITE(RS480_NB_MC_INDEX, \
1887 ((addr) & 0xff) | RS480_NB_MC_IND_WR_EN); \
1888 RADEON_WRITE(RS480_NB_MC_DATA, (val)); \
1889 RADEON_WRITE(RS480_NB_MC_INDEX, 0xff); \
1890} while (0)
1891
1892#define RS690_WRITE_MCIND(addr, val) \
1893do { \
1894 RADEON_WRITE(RS690_MC_INDEX, RS690_MC_INDEX_WR_EN | ((addr) & RS690_MC_INDEX_MASK)); \
1895 RADEON_WRITE(RS690_MC_DATA, val); \
1896 RADEON_WRITE(RS690_MC_INDEX, RS690_MC_INDEX_WR_ACK); \
1897} while (0)
1898
1899#define RS600_WRITE_MCIND(addr, val) \
1900do { \
1901 RADEON_WRITE(RS600_MC_INDEX, RS600_MC_IND_WR_EN | RS600_MC_IND_CITF_ARB0 | ((addr) & RS600_MC_ADDR_MASK)); \
1902 RADEON_WRITE(RS600_MC_DATA, val); \
1903} while (0)
1904
1905#define IGP_WRITE_MCIND(addr, val) \
1906do { \
1907 if (((dev_priv->flags & RADEON_FAMILY_MASK) == CHIP_RS690) || \
1908 ((dev_priv->flags & RADEON_FAMILY_MASK) == CHIP_RS740)) \
1909 RS690_WRITE_MCIND(addr, val); \
1910 else if ((dev_priv->flags & RADEON_FAMILY_MASK) == CHIP_RS600) \
1911 RS600_WRITE_MCIND(addr, val); \
1912 else \
1913 RS480_WRITE_MCIND(addr, val); \
1914} while (0)
1915
1916#define CP_PACKET0( reg, n ) \
1917 (RADEON_CP_PACKET0 | ((n) << 16) | ((reg) >> 2))
1918#define CP_PACKET0_TABLE( reg, n ) \
1919 (RADEON_CP_PACKET0 | RADEON_ONE_REG_WR | ((n) << 16) | ((reg) >> 2))
1920#define CP_PACKET1( reg0, reg1 ) \
1921 (RADEON_CP_PACKET1 | (((reg1) >> 2) << 15) | ((reg0) >> 2))
1922#define CP_PACKET2() \
1923 (RADEON_CP_PACKET2)
1924#define CP_PACKET3( pkt, n ) \
1925 (RADEON_CP_PACKET3 | (pkt) | ((n) << 16))

1931#define RADEON_WAIT_UNTIL_2D_IDLE() do { \
1932 OUT_RING( CP_PACKET0( RADEON_WAIT_UNTIL, 0 ) ); \
1933 OUT_RING( (RADEON_WAIT_2D_IDLECLEAN | \
1934 RADEON_WAIT_HOST_IDLECLEAN) ); \
1935} while (0)
1936
1937#define RADEON_WAIT_UNTIL_3D_IDLE() do { \
1938 OUT_RING( CP_PACKET0( RADEON_WAIT_UNTIL, 0 ) ); \
1939 OUT_RING( (RADEON_WAIT_3D_IDLECLEAN | \
1940 RADEON_WAIT_HOST_IDLECLEAN) ); \
1941} while (0)
1942
1943#define RADEON_WAIT_UNTIL_IDLE() do { \
1944 OUT_RING( CP_PACKET0( RADEON_WAIT_UNTIL, 0 ) ); \
1945 OUT_RING( (RADEON_WAIT_2D_IDLECLEAN | \
1946 RADEON_WAIT_3D_IDLECLEAN | \
1947 RADEON_WAIT_HOST_IDLECLEAN) ); \
1948} while (0)
1949
1950#define RADEON_WAIT_UNTIL_PAGE_FLIPPED() do { \
1951 OUT_RING( CP_PACKET0( RADEON_WAIT_UNTIL, 0 ) ); \
1952 OUT_RING( RADEON_WAIT_CRTC_PFLIP ); \
1953} while (0)
1954
1955#define RADEON_FLUSH_CACHE() do { \
1956 if ((dev_priv->flags & RADEON_FAMILY_MASK) <= CHIP_RV280) { \
1957 OUT_RING(CP_PACKET0(RADEON_RB3D_DSTCACHE_CTLSTAT, 0)); \
1958 OUT_RING(RADEON_RB3D_DC_FLUSH); \
1959 } else { \
1960 OUT_RING(CP_PACKET0(R300_RB3D_DSTCACHE_CTLSTAT, 0)); \
1961 OUT_RING(R300_RB3D_DC_FLUSH); \
1962 } \
1963} while (0)
1964
1965#define RADEON_PURGE_CACHE() do { \
1966 if ((dev_priv->flags & RADEON_FAMILY_MASK) <= CHIP_RV280) { \
1967 OUT_RING(CP_PACKET0(RADEON_RB3D_DSTCACHE_CTLSTAT, 0)); \
1968 OUT_RING(RADEON_RB3D_DC_FLUSH | RADEON_RB3D_DC_FREE); \
1969 } else { \
1970 OUT_RING(CP_PACKET0(R300_RB3D_DSTCACHE_CTLSTAT, 0)); \
1971 OUT_RING(R300_RB3D_DC_FLUSH | R300_RB3D_DC_FREE); \
1972 } \
1973} while (0)
1974
1975#define RADEON_FLUSH_ZCACHE() do { \
1976 if ((dev_priv->flags & RADEON_FAMILY_MASK) <= CHIP_RV280) { \
1977 OUT_RING(CP_PACKET0(RADEON_RB3D_ZCACHE_CTLSTAT, 0)); \
1978 OUT_RING(RADEON_RB3D_ZC_FLUSH); \
1979 } else { \
1980 OUT_RING(CP_PACKET0(R300_ZB_ZCACHE_CTLSTAT, 0)); \
1981 OUT_RING(R300_ZC_FLUSH); \
1982 } \
1983} while (0)
1984
1985#define RADEON_PURGE_ZCACHE() do { \
1986 if ((dev_priv->flags & RADEON_FAMILY_MASK) <= CHIP_RV280) { \
1987 OUT_RING(CP_PACKET0(RADEON_RB3D_ZCACHE_CTLSTAT, 0)); \
1988 OUT_RING(RADEON_RB3D_ZC_FLUSH | RADEON_RB3D_ZC_FREE); \
1989 } else { \
1990 OUT_RING(CP_PACKET0(R300_ZB_ZCACHE_CTLSTAT, 0)); \
1991 OUT_RING(R300_ZC_FLUSH | R300_ZC_FREE); \
1992 } \
1993} while (0)

1999/* Perfbox functionality only.
2000 */
2001#define RING_SPACE_TEST_WITH_RETURN( dev_priv ) \
2002do { \
2003 if (!(dev_priv->stats.boxes & RADEON_BOX_DMA_IDLE)) { \
2004 u32 head = GET_RING_HEAD( dev_priv ); \
2005 if (head == dev_priv->ring.tail) \
2006 dev_priv->stats.boxes |= RADEON_BOX_DMA_IDLE; \
2007 } \
2008} while (0)
2009
2010#define VB_AGE_TEST_WITH_RETURN( dev_priv ) \
2011do { \
2012 struct drm_radeon_master_private *master_priv = file_priv->master->driver_priv; \
2013 drm_radeon_sarea_t *sarea_priv = master_priv->sarea_priv; \
2014 if ( sarea_priv->last_dispatch >= RADEON_MAX_VB_AGE ) { \
2015 int __ret; \
2016 if ((dev_priv->flags & RADEON_FAMILY_MASK) >= CHIP_R600) \
2017 __ret = r600_do_cp_idle(dev_priv); \
2018 else \
2019 __ret = radeon_do_cp_idle(dev_priv); \
2020 if ( __ret ) return __ret; \
2021 sarea_priv->last_dispatch = 0; \
2022 radeon_freelist_reset( dev ); \
2023 } \
2024} while (0)

2050 OUT_RING(age); \

2059/* ================================================================
2060 * Ring control
2061 */
2062
2063#define RADEON_VERBOSE 0
2064
2065#define RING_LOCALS int write, _nr, _align_nr; unsigned int mask; u32 *ring;
2066
2067#define RADEON_RING_ALIGN 16
2068
2069#define BEGIN_RING( n ) do { \
2070 if ( RADEON_VERBOSE ) { \
2071 DRM_INFO( "BEGIN_RING( %d )\n", (n)); \
2072 } \
2073 _align_nr = RADEON_RING_ALIGN - ((dev_priv->ring.tail + n) & (RADEON_RING_ALIGN-1)); \
2074 _align_nr += n; \
2075 if (dev_priv->ring.space <= (_align_nr * sizeof(u32))) { \
2076 COMMIT_RING(); \
2077 radeon_wait_ring( dev_priv, _align_nr * sizeof(u32)); \
2078 } \
2079 _nr = n; dev_priv->ring.space -= (n) * sizeof(u32); \
2080 ring = dev_priv->ring.start; \
2081 write = dev_priv->ring.tail; \
2082 mask = dev_priv->ring.tail_mask; \
2083} while (0)
2084
2085#define ADVANCE_RING() do { \
2086 if ( RADEON_VERBOSE ) { \
2087 DRM_INFO( "ADVANCE_RING() wr=0x%06x tail=0x%06x\n", \
2088 write, dev_priv->ring.tail ); \
2089 } \
2090 if (((dev_priv->ring.tail + _nr) & mask) != write) { \
2091 DRM_ERROR( \
2092 "ADVANCE_RING(): mismatch: nr: %x write: %x line: %d\n", \
2093 ((dev_priv->ring.tail + _nr) & mask), \
2094 write, __LINE__); \
2095 } else \
2096 dev_priv->ring.tail = write; \
2097} while (0)
2098
2099extern void radeon_commit_ring(drm_radeon_private_t *dev_priv);
2100
2101#define COMMIT_RING() do { \
2102 radeon_commit_ring(dev_priv); \
2103 } while(0)
2104
2105#define OUT_RING( x ) do { \
2106 if ( RADEON_VERBOSE ) { \
2107 DRM_INFO( " OUT_RING( 0x%08x ) at 0x%x\n", \
2108 (unsigned int)(x), write ); \
2109 } \
2110 ring[write++] = (x); \
2111 write &= mask; \
2112} while (0)
2113
2114#define OUT_RING_REG( reg, val ) do { \
2115 OUT_RING( CP_PACKET0( reg, 0 ) ); \
2116 OUT_RING( val ); \
2117} while (0)
2118
2119#define OUT_RING_TABLE( tab, sz ) do { \
2120 int _size = (sz); \
2121 int *_tab = (int *)(tab); \
2122 \
2123 if (write + _size > mask) { \
2124 int _i = (mask+1) - write; \
2125 _size -= _i; \
2126 while (_i > 0 ) { \
2127 *(int *)(ring + write) = *_tab++; \
2128 write++; \
2129 _i--; \
2130 } \
2131 write = 0; \
2132 _tab += _i; \
2133 } \
2134 while (_size > 0) { \
2135 *(ring + write) = *_tab++; \
2136 write++; \
2137 _size--; \
2138 } \
2139 write &= mask; \
2140} while (0)
2141
2142/**
2143 * Copy given number of dwords from drm buffer to the ring buffer.
2144 */
2145#define OUT_RING_DRM_BUFFER(buf, sz) do { \
2146 int _size = (sz) * 4; \
2147 struct drm_buffer *_buf = (buf); \
2148 int _part_size; \
2149 while (_size > 0) { \
2150 _part_size = _size; \
2151 \
2152 if (write + _part_size/4 > mask) \
2153 _part_size = ((mask + 1) - write)*4; \
2154 \
2155 if (drm_buffer_index(_buf) + _part_size > PAGE_SIZE) \
2156 _part_size = PAGE_SIZE - drm_buffer_index(_buf);\
2157 \
2158 \
2159 \
2160 memcpy(ring + write, &_buf->data[drm_buffer_page(_buf)] \
2161 [drm_buffer_index(_buf)], _part_size); \
2162 \
2163 _size -= _part_size; \
2164 write = (write + _part_size/4) & mask; \
2165 drm_buffer_advance(_buf, _part_size); \
2166 } \
2167} while (0)
